  • Footer

Footer

A flexible content located on the bottom of the site.



Basic Setup

Put all your footer related content inside the class name ".footer" to make your content organized.

Logo
  • Menu 1
  • Menu 2
  • Menu 3
  • Menu 4
© . All rights reserved.


HTML example markup
<div class="footer">
	<div class="footer-content">
		<div class="container">
			<div class="row">
				<div class="grid-8">
					<div class="footer-logo">Logo</div>
					<ul class="footer-nav">
						<li class="active"><a href="#">Menu 1</a></li>
						<li><a href="#">Menu 2</a></li>
						<li><a href="#">Menu 3</a></li>
						<li><a href="#">Menu 4</a></li>
					</ul>
				</div>
				<div class="grid-4">
					<ul class="footer-social">
						<li><a href="#"><i class="fa fa-facebook"></i></a></li>
						<li><a href="#"><i class="fa fa-twitter"></i></a></li>
						<li><a href="#"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i></a></li>
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="footer-bottom text-center">
		<div class="copyright">© 2014. All rights reserved.</div>
	</div>
</div>


Footer Content

This element is the main content of the footer. Use a class name ".footer-content".

HTML example markup
<div class="footer-content">
	...
</div>


Footer Logo

For Logos or Site's name, use a class name ".footer-logo".

Logo


HTML example markup
<div class="footer-logo">
	...
</div>


Footer Nav

An element consists of menu item. use a class name ".footer-nav".

See Navigation for reference.



Footer Social

For footer social media, use a class name ".footer-social".



HTML example markup
<ul class="footer-social">
	<li><a href="#"><i class="fa fa-facebook"></i></a></li>
	<li><a href="#"><i class="fa fa-twitter"></i></a></li>
	<li><a href="#"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i></a></li>
</ul>


Copyright

Use a class name ".copyright". You can change the style (font size, color, etc).

© . All rights reserved.

HTML example markup
<div class="copyright">...</div>


Footer Top / Footer Bottom

An extra elements for better markup. Use a class name ".footer-top" and ".footer-bottom". These are only optional, if you have extra content.

Footer Top Content Here
Footer Bottom Content Here


HTML example markup
<div class="footer-top">
	...
</div>
<div class="footer-bottom">
	...
</div>


SASS Configuration Variables

// Footer - Basic Styling
$footer-color: $color-secondary !default;

// Footer Content - Basic Styling
$footer-content-bg: $color-default !default;

// Footer Content - padding
$footer-content-padding-top-default: 70px !default;
$footer-content-padding-bottom-default: 70px !default;
$footer-content-padding-left-default: 0px !default;
$footer-content-padding-right-default: 0px !default;

// Footer Content - padding for Small screen
$footer-content-padding-top-small: 40px !default;
$footer-content-padding-bottom-small: 40px !default;
$footer-content-padding-left-small: 0px !default;
$footer-content-padding-right-small: 0px !default;

// Footer Content - padding for Medium screen
$footer-content-padding-top-medium: 40px !default;
$footer-content-padding-bottom-medium: 40px !default;
$footer-content-padding-left-medium: 0px !default;
$footer-content-padding-right-medium: 0px !default;

// Footer Logo - Basic Styling
$footer-logo-color: $color-secondary !default;
$footer-logo-font-size: 28px !default;
$footer-logo-border-right: 3px solid #d34548 !default;

// Footer Logo - padding (if you put a border)
$footer-logo-padding-right: 25px !default;

// Footer Logo - margins for alignment purposes
$footer-logo-margin-top: 13px !default;
$footer-logo-margin-right: 25px !default;

// Footer Social - Basic Styling
// Footer Social - margins
$footer-social-margin-top: 0px !default;
$footer-social-margin-bottom: 0px !default;
$footer-social-margin-right: 0px !default;
$footer-social-margin-left: 0px !default;

// Footer Social List 
$footer-social-list-margin-right: 8px !default;
$footer-social-list-margin-left: 8px !default;

// Footer Social Link 
$footer-social-link-font-size: 30px !default;
$footer-social-link-color: $color-white !default;			
$footer-social-link-bg: #425563 !default;

// Optional if  you want a circle background. 
$footer-social-link-dimension: 58px !default; // This will set the width/height/line-height
$footer-social-link-border-radius: 50% !default; // To make it a circle background

// Footer Social Link - Hover
$footer-social-link-color: $color-white !default;
$footer-social-link-bg-hover: $color-primary !default;

// Footer Top 
// Footer Top - Optional Elements
// Footer Top - Styling
$footer-top-color: $color-default !default;
$footer-top-bg: $color-gray-lighten !default;
$footer-top-border: none !default;

// Footer Top - padding
$footer-top-padding: 24px !default;

// Footer Bottom 
// Footer Bottom - Styling
$footer-bottom-color: $color-white !default;
$footer-bottom-bg: $footer-content-bg !default;
$footer-bottom-border: 1px solid #425563 !default;

// Footer Bottom - padding
$footer-bottom-padding: 24px !default;

// Footer Copyright
$copyright-font-size: 14px !default;
$copyright-color: $color-white !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
